#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Tees.

== Name ==

Tees (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Tees (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Set of tees from which a golf course can be played.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  colour = xs:string  date-from = xs:date  date-to = xs:date  gender = [SGolfingGender.html GolfingGender.html]  
            *name = xs:string*
            units = [SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum.html UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum.html]>  (qualification, tee{1,18}, version`*`  )</...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CHoleQualification.html golfml:HoleQualification] || [CHoleQualification.html qualification] ||  					Qualification of the hole for handicaping purposes.				 ||
|| [CTee.html golfml:Tee] || [CTee.html tee] ||  Description of a single hole. ||
|| [CVersion.html golfml:Version] || [CVersion.html version] ||  					Records tee set modifications over time.				 ||
